plot: A young gamer whose life revolves around the culture; one day finds himself pulled into an alternate reality where video games are real life. There he must fight his way across the various video game genres to find his way home.
title: My Life as a Video Game
plot_es: A young gamer whose life revolves around the culture; one day finds himself pulled into an alternate reality where video games are real life. There he must fight his way across the various video game genres to find his way home.
original_name: My Life as a Video Game
plot_en: A young gamer whose life revolves around the culture; one day finds himself pulled into an alternate reality where video games are real life. There he must fight his way across the various video game genres to find his way home.
